action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image depicts a coastal cityscape with a clear sky. A propeller-driven airplane is flying above the sea, which is dotted with numerous sailboats. The city's skyline is visible in the background, featuring various buildings and skyscrapers. The sea appears calm, and the overall atmosphere is serene. The colors are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and sea contrasting with the silhouettes of the buildings and the white sails of the boats.
